# Strands Agents SDK with Gemini Live support
strands-agents[bidi-gemini]

# NOTE: Strands experimental bidi currently imports the OpenAI realtime module
# during package import, which requires websockets>=15.
websockets>=15,<16

# Audio I/O for voice conversations
pyaudio>=0.2.14

# Env loading
python-dotenv>=1.0.0

# Alternative: install all bidi providers
# strands-agents[bidi-all]
